Constructor Detail

Wall

public Wall(float scale,
            float left,
            float right,
            float top,
            float bottom)
Constructs a wall of the default color at the given coordinates.

Parameters:
scale - the size of the maze containing the ball.
left - x coordinate of the left side.
right - x coordinate of the right side.
top - y coordinate of the top side.
bottom - y coordinate of the bottom side.
Method Detail

getCenter

public float[] getCenter()
Gets the center coordinates of this wall.

Returns:
an array of two floats (x, y).

getHalfSize

public float[] getHalfSize()
Gets the half widht and half height of this wall.

Returns:
an array of two floats (half width, half height).
